mapper.insert: insert into club (club_Id, name, la, lo, icon, address, tel, photo, type) values (#{clubId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{la,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT})

update club

where club_Id = #{clubId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
